prompt:
Use case: social ad
Primary request: A premium 12-second investor/influencer-style teaser for an AI-powered personal website platform, with voiceover narration.
Scene/background: Dark cinematic digital studio with floating UI panels and code blocks, no people.
Subject: Product interface moments: blog cards, multilingual audio controls (EN/HI/TA), semantic search results panel, and a 3D science visualization widget.
Action: beat 1 (0-4s) portfolio grid transforms into a live product dashboard; beat 2 (4-8s) audio controls and semantic search animate with highlighted results; beat 3 (8-12s) 3D science visual rotates and resolves to an end card.
Camera: smooth dolly-in with subtle parallax, stable framing.
Lighting/mood: confident, premium, high-contrast tech launch vibe.
Color palette: graphite, electric blue, cyan, white.
Style/format: clean modern product trailer, motion graphics focused.
Timing/beats: 0-4 reveal, 4-8 proof points, 8-12 CTA hold.
Audio: subtle cinematic pulse plus clear synthetic voiceover, no copyrighted music.
Text (verbatim): "Not a portfolio. A content operating system.", "OpenAI-powered blog audio", "Semantic search", "WebGPU visuals", "Try it now -> kumar2net.com/blog"
Dialogue:
<dialogue>
- Narrator: "Cutting-edge AI here means one stack for voice, search, and interactive visuals."
- Narrator: "It runs multilingual OpenAI audio, semantic search, and live WebGPU science pages."
- Narrator: "Try it at kumar2net dot com slash blog."
</dialogue>
Constraints: no real people, no logos, text must stay legible.
Avoid: flicker, jitter, unreadable text, watermark artifacts.
